page: ArcGIS Online Signage, Parking, and Counts Webmap Update
rangeText: a link to the the folder with the photos when ready to upload
title: Comment: Are all photos replaced every six mon...
description: Are all photos replaced every six months? Or, just the new ones? If the latter, is there a way to know which ones are new? Also, are there any file size requirements for the .jpgs?
